name: NAPA VALLEY TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY
sampleDescriptions: Seek funding for highway and transit projects. Support funding for transportation programs, including Bus and Bus Facilities, BUILD, Safe Streets and INFRA.
Support Robust Transportation Reauthorization legislation, including maintaining key programs. This includes Bus and Bus Facilities, BUILD, INFRA, Safe Streets for All, and Reconnecting Communities.
Support for local transportation and transit projects through grants and congressionally directed spending projects.
